node.name: Exotic Northern Hardwood Plantation Cultural Type (CTY018)
node.id: Exotic Northern Hardwood Plantation Cultural Type (CTY018)
description: Exotic hardwood tree species found in ecodivisions 210, M210, 220, M220, 330
and ecoprovince 251. [note - no exotic hardwoods are known to be commonly planted.
If common exotic hardwood plantation species are identified, they should be added to
this list and additional couplets added below].
